project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of: (i) completion of road reconstruction works initiated under the Second Road Maintenance and Reconstruction Project (Loan 1784-DO); (ii) purchase of equipment, tools and spare parts for the road maintenance fleet; (iii) technical assistance to improve the planning, programming and executing capacity of the Secretariat of State for Public Works and Communications (SEOPC); (iv) technical assistance to the domestic contractors and SEOPC staff to improve road paving techniques; (v) technical assistance to SEOPC for maintenance operations and training including support to SEOPC's maintenance training school; and (vi) construction and improvement of about 100 km of rural roads using appropriate construction techniques.
